extendedInfo.description: The widely acclaimed, âââââ news app is now available on Android! With Umano you will hear real people with amazing voices read interesting news articles to you. Here are some things you can do with Umano: â Browse the most interesting articles from top news sourcesâ Make a playlist with articles that interest youâ Download articles to listen to offlineâ Personalize your listening experienceâ Search & Explore from a large library of contentâ See what your friends are listening toAs reported on...Time:  "Umano: One of 50 Best Android Apps of 2013"Forbes:  "Umano. Can you think of a better way to pass the time on a commute?"PandoDaily:  "Umano wants to tell you the news, literally"TechCrunch:  "An app that provides commuters (and others) a curated selection of articles read by voice actors"Notes on Permissions: - Read Contacts - we only require this permission to help you invite friends to Umano. We will NEVER scrape your address book and send it anywhere. - Read Sensitive Log Data - we only require this permission to better analyze app crashes so that we can make your Umano experience as smooth as possible. We do *not* store any sensitive personal data on our servers.

reviews.title: Very Impressive App!
reviews.comment: Very impressive. .. good listening to the articles. .. altho the American voice overs can be a bit much... would like more European accents... otherwise excellent app!
reviews.author: Stephen Walsh

reviews.title: Unbelievably Awesome
reviews.comment: Content is relevant.  Readers are Audible worthy...actually better.  Thank you for a reading option...and auto. This is an app I enjoy daily.
reviews.author: Mary McCarthy

reviews.title: It\'s great.
reviews.comment: But would nice if there was more local nice for Toronto Ontario canada for example. If would have local news from every part of the world that be cool
reviews.author: Vito Corrado

reviews.comment: Great app.  My eyes tire quickly when reading a screen so I\'m really enjoying the features offered by this app. Some of the voices could be more expressive and broader selection of news, but overall great service!
reviews.author: Rob Alan

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love listening to articles on the go. Would be nice if audio stream would stop when other apps attempt to play something (RunKeeper notifications in my case), but awesome app either way.
reviews.author: Jason Casiday

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: What a perfect idea!! Very impressive implementation. Just need to add more sources. Add a news of the day and international news section. That would make this awesome app even more awesome.
reviews.author: Sushil Nankar

reviews.comment: Easy and elegant interface,  impressive functions and overall a great app
reviews.author: Hamza Shah

reviews.title: Excellent app!!!
reviews.comment: Love the off line listening feature. This is a high quality app with high quality voice talent reading news clips.
reviews.author: Mike Hopper

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: love this app. this is perfect to catch up on great articles while working out or traveling to and from work
reviews.author: Leonidas Bratini

reviews.title: Love not reading!
reviews.comment: Don\'t get me wrong; I love to read articles, but don\'t have the time.  Now I can. Voices are ok. Need more topics, however. Where are the sports articles?
reviews.author: Stephanie Gray

reviews.title: Thank you for simple brilliance.
reviews.comment: This app has set the standard for easy and fast news and commentary. Solid library, beautiful design and fast social sharing. I even look forward to that frickin\' jingle intro! Ahhhhh!!! Help!!! Really great job guys.
reviews.author: Lawrence Blumberg

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: This is one of my best apps. The quality is great, and intuitive layout. Thanks a lot. Can\'t stop reading out loud... Try it n find out.
reviews.author: Michael Thomas

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: It works well. If I could take away half a star I would just because sometimes it seems like the available articles is limited a bit. I suspect that it is because they are still a bit young. I hope it takes off and succeeds because I think the service is a great fit on mobile devices.
reviews.author: Drew Mills

reviews.title: Very useful app. Love It
reviews.comment: I love the articles. The app reading the article for me allows me to stay up on current trends and information.
reviews.author: Chris Finley

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: I usually prefer to read than listen to narration, but this is very well implemented, clean and functional. Well done.
reviews.author: Osagie E

reviews.title: It\'s so convenient!!!
reviews.comment: I used to read a lot on the web but because of my busy schedule I find it hard to make time for reading. This app keeps me informed since they provide audio materials that are constantly being updated on a daily basis. Now, I can listen while taking a shower, brushing my teeth, changing clothes and even while commuting. It\'s so easy to fit it in my tight schedule. Highly recommended app!
reviews.author: Trevor Cruz

reviews.title: A good selection of well read interesting articles.
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty cool to be able to \'read\' some of the better writing on the Internet while busy doing other things that occupy eyes and hands. Sometimes it seems hard to establish a connection, although that could be because I\'m in China.
reviews.author: Steven Crosby

reviews.title: Mobile news
reviews.comment: A great way to get the latest news while driving to/from work.  The quality is excellent also.
reviews.author: Lanny Sutton

reviews.title: An apt app
reviews.comment: The app fulfills its basic purpose well. Voice quality is good. Would like to see following additional options: 1) A read button on main page (no audio) 2) Frequency changer with more options  3) Option to add, modify news sources
reviews.author: mohit gulati

reviews.title: Nice app. But the notification priority is a bit high
reviews.comment: I really like the app, but I don\'t need to see an icon in the status bar for trending topics. If the developers used the lowest priority for the trending notification the issue would be resolved.
reviews.author: Steven Glickman
